Reviews.Title: It's Okay!
Reviews.Author: adrianne "adro"
Reviews.Content: I just received my phone yesterday. The phone itself is nice. It comes with the two batteries, earphones, and a cover case. Everything is nice and clear when you turn it on, but the camera quality is BAD! I love taking pictures and there is barely any flash and the pictures aren't as nearly clear and bright as the default pictures that come on the phone. So if you don't really take pictures, you will be fine. I haven't really used any other features yet. But I will do a follow up once I have.
